name: Jordan T. Romero
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: An observant and innovative software engineer with a proven ability to deliver efficient and user-focused solutions. Boasts strong practical programming skills, effective communication, and robust project management capabilities, fostering productive work environments and team-centric projects. Committed to continuous learning, UI/UX design, and adopting the latest technologies to drive advancements in software development.

responsibilities: Spearheaded development projects utilizing a comprehensive tech stack: React, TypeScript, Node.js, GraphQL, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Auth0, significantly enhancing platform capabilities and user experience.
Architected and implemented microservices-based solutions, leveraging AWS services and Amazon EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service) to improve scalability and maintainability of the platform.
Played a key role in building and implementing the funder platform, a critical component of Resilia's offering, demonstrating ability to deliver complex, high-impact features.
Contributed to every aspect of the Resilia platform, touching and improving various features across the entire system, showcasing deep understanding and versatility.
Collaborated closely with product and design teams to expedite feature rollouts and troubleshoot issues, improving project delivery times and cross-functional teamwork.
Mentored junior developers, promoting best practices in modern web development, cloud architecture, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
Implemented robust error handling and logging systems to enhance application reliability in a distributed microservices environment.

projects.name: Overview of Collaborated Goal Experience
projects.description: Implemented analytics tracking in the dashboard actions module.

projects.name: Executive Dashboard Overview
projects.description: Streamlined executive reporting with real-time data.

projects.name: Funder Goals Page
projects.description: Enabled funders to track goals and measure impact.

projects.name: Needs Assessment
projects.description: Designed and deployed tools for user needs evaluation.

responsibilities: Utilized strong practical programming skills to build products quickly and efficiently in a high-paced, start-up environment.
Worked closely across teams to produce quality, responsive UI with React and React Native.
Implemented and analyzed A/B tests to optimize user experience and inform product decisions.
Led the development and successful launch of a new product within a two-week timeframe, demonstrating ability to deliver under tight deadlines.
Developed and launched key product features, contributing to improved user retention.
Optimized API integration to enhance app performance and reduce load times.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement responsive designs, improving mobile user experience.

projects.name: Website Revamp
projects.description: Redesigned and implemented the company's marketing website to align with brand standards and improve user experience. Focused on responsive design and SEO optimization.

projects.name: Guaranteed Offer Product Release
projects.description: Led the development and release of the 'Guaranteed Offer' product. Delivered all marketing materials, web updates, and product launch elements within two weeks.
